label: Enable Tab Context Menu Organizer
description: Enable or disable the tab context menu organization features

label: Show Tab Movement Options
description: Show options to move tabs (Move to start, Move to end, Move to new window)

label: Show Workspace Options
description: Show options to move tabs to different workspaces

label: Show Device Sync Options
description: Show options to send tabs to other devices

label: Show Container Options
description: Show options to open tabs in different containers

label: Show Visual Separators
description: Add visual separators between different sections of the context menu
